input_text.Prompt:
Conversation:
Adam: Hey, Frank. I heard you got a new job.
Daniel: Yeah, Judy. I will be working for the Post Office. It's not a bad job.
Adam: Is it true that you have a heavy work schedule?
Daniel: That's right. I am supposed to work at 5am everyday, and I only get 45 minutes for lunch.
Adam: So, why did you apply for such a demanding job?
Daniel: Well, the government offers its employees excellent health insurance benefits.
Adam: Oh, I see. And can your family members utilize the health insurance, too?
Daniel: Yeah, that's the best part. All of my children can get free medical care.
Adam: That's a great employment benefit!
Daniel: Now you know why I wanted to work for the Post Office!

Now write a summary of the conversation:
input_text.Response A: Daniel got a new job at the Post Office. He has a heavy work schedule but he wanted this job because of the excellent health insurance benefits for him and his family.
input_text.Response B: In this conversation, Adam and Daniel discuss Daniel's new job as a postal worker. Daniel explains that he has a heavy work schedule, but that he applied because of the government-provided health insurance benefits. He also mentions that his family members can utilize the health insurance, too. Adam is impressed by this benefit and asks Daniel why he wanted to work for the Post Office. Daniel explains that it is a great employment benefit, and they both agree that it is a good reason to pursue the job.

label_annotations.feedback: response a is way shorter summary so it seems better to me.
